text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-8-1/" title="1 Chronicles 8:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-2/" title="1 Chronicles 8:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-3/" title="1 Chronicles 8:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-4/" title="1 Chronicles 8:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-5/" title="1 Chronicles 8:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-6/" title="1 Chronicles 8:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And these *are* the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-7/" title="1 Chronicles 8:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-8/" title="1 Chronicles 8:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And Shaharaim begat *children* in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara *were* his wives.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-9/" title="1 Chronicles 8:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-10/" title="1 Chronicles 8:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These *were* his sons, heads of the fathers.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-11/" title="1 Chronicles 8:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-12/" title="1 Chronicles 8:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-13/" title="1 Chronicles 8:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 Beriah also, and Shema, who *were* heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-14/" title="1 Chronicles 8:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-15/" title="1 Chronicles 8:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-16/" title="1 Chronicles 8:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-17/" title="1 Chronicles 8:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-18/" title="1 Chronicles 8:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-19/" title="1 Chronicles 8:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-20/" title="1 Chronicles 8:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-21/" title="1 Chronicles 8:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-22/" title="1 Chronicles 8:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-23/" title="1 Chronicles 8:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-24/" title="1 Chronicles 8:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-25/" title="1 Chronicles 8:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-26/" title="1 Chronicles 8:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-27/" title="1 Chronicles 8:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-28/" title="1 Chronicles 8:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 These *were* heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief *men*. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-29/" title="1 Chronicles 8:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife's name *was* Maachah:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-30/" title="1 Chronicles 8:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-31/" title="1 Chronicles 8:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-32/" title="1 Chronicles 8:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32 And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-33/" title="1 Chronicles 8:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33 And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-34/" title="1 Chronicles 8:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34 And the son of Jonathan *was* Meribbaal; and Meribbaal begat Micah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-35/" title="1 Chronicles 8:35 KJV verse detail"><span id="37" class="versehover">35 And the sons of Micah *were*, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-36/" title="1 Chronicles 8:36 KJV verse detail"><span id="38" class="versehover">36 And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-37/" title="1 Chronicles 8:37 KJV verse detail"><span id="39" class="versehover">37 And Moza begat Binea: Rapha *was* his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-38/" title="1 Chronicles 8:38 KJV verse detail"><span id="40" class="versehover">38 And Azel had six sons, whose names *are* these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these *were* the sons of Azel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-39/" title="1 Chronicles 8:39 KJV verse detail"><span id="41" class="versehover">39 And the sons of Eshek his brother *were*, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-8-40/" title="1 Chronicles 8:40 KJV verse detail"><span id="42" class="versehover">40 And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons' sons, an hundred and fifty. All these *are* of the sons of Benjamin.
